name: Smart Security Checker
author: SmartSoftFirm

sections.description:
This plugin Allows users to check for malware and other security issues on their WordPress website. Use this tool to check your WordPress website for malware and other security issues.

Features

  • Security check
  • Malware check
  • Any others Security check.
  • Simply one click serurity and malwayre check.

NEED HELP?

Is there any feature that you want to get in this plugin?
Needs assistance to use this plugin?
Feel free to Contact us
sections.installation:
It’s easy to install. Just Install the plugin and you will see a new admin new “Smart Security Checker” click this and there will visible a button “check for security issue” Click this button there will automatically check your website’s security issue and will show a notice about the result.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Just install and active.
  4. Click admin new “Smart Security Checker”
  5. Click button “check for security issue”
